attributes.action: agree in a way of coming out of the EU or all MPS should resign and not resit
attributes.additional_details: in a clear vote over 2 years ago it was decide by the british pepole that we should leave the EU but dispite this the house has been unable to find a solution of doing it, a second vote is not required because if his was done it would mean that in future any votes at a election could amd should be held again, the country voted yo leave and leave we must, and if MPs from all sides are unable to carry out the instructions of the British people all MPs should resign and not resit in parliment,
attributes.background: The country voted and gave a clear message that we should withdraw from the EU, if MPs are unable to agree and are unable to find a solution of coming out of the EU as requested by the British people all MPS from all parties should resign and not be able to sit in the house of parliment in future.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
